#summary SANE_Status sane_start(SANE_Handle handle)
#labels Devel-Frontend

{{{

scan:
        if (tries == 0) {
                ... warn the user ...
                return SANE_STATUS_IO_ERROR;
        }

        status = sane_start(handle);

        if (status == SANE_STATUS_WARMING_UP) {
                tries--;
                ... wait some 10/15 secs ...
                goto scan;
        }

        ...
}}}

Optionally an [Evolved] frontend can use [sane_check_warm_up] to test
the warm up condition.
